sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.LicensingErrorLogSyncer</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Sync loag records from licensing_error to central instance</description>
        <name>LicensingErrorLogSyncer</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LicensingErrorLogSyncer = Class.create();
    LicensingErrorLogSyncer.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    this.entitlementEngineUtils = new sn_lef.EntitlementEngineUtils();
    },

    syncLicensingErrorLog : function() {
      const payloadGenerator = new LicensingErrorPayloadGenerator();
      const payload = payloadGenerator.generatePayload();
      this._send(payload);
    },

    _send : function(payload) {
      const endPointURL = LicensingEngineConstants.LICENSING_ERRORS_UPLOAD_SERVICE_URL;
      const restMethod = "POST";
      var authorization = this.entitlementEngineUtils.getAuthHeader();
      var headers = {
            'Authorization': authorization
        };

    var restObject = {
            'end_point': endPointURL,
            'headers': headers,
            'rest_method': restMethod,
            'request_body': JSON.stringify(payload)
        };

    var licDownloaderUtils = new LicensingDownloaderUtils();
    var resp = licDownloaderUtils.executeRESTAPI(restObject);
    return resp;
	},
	
    type: 'LicensingErrorLogSyncer'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-05-12 08:32:46</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>19bcc4495b322110bfc36b155981c7a2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LicensingErrorLogSyncer</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_19bcc4495b322110bfc36b155981c7a2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-05-22 05:35:35</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
